import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{FaSpinner}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GeminiAI=_ref=>{let{onContentGenerated}=_ref;const[prompt,setPrompt]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[contentType,setContentType]=useState('blog');const contentTypes=[{value:'blog',label:'Blog Post'},{value:'article',label:'Article'},{value:'social',label:'Social Media'},{value:'seo',label:'SEO Content'},{value:'email',label:'Email'},{value:'other',label:'Other'}];const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!prompt.trim()){setError('Please enter a prompt');return;}try{setLoading(true);setError(null);// Get user token from localStorage
